name: Cargo Truck Parking Transport
description:
Cargo Transport-er Truck Driving & Parking Simulator Game 2017
Get ready for a breathtaking cargo truck race with Fire up your engines in this 4x4 real truck simulator driving game! City Cargo Truck is one of the most addictive interesting and amazing cargo truck Hero driver 2017 simulator transport game. If you want to become a heavy cargo truck driver 2017 then you should play this Grand truck cargo simulator because it is the best game in all cargo transport games. As a cargo driver you have to drive cargo transport truck in beautiful big city to deliver the heavy cargo. This is a very dangerous truck cargo driving 3d game because the tracks are very tricky and curvy in big city traffic game. Play City Cargo Transport Simulator for biggest adventures in 2017.
Cargo truck drive 2017 is the newest challenging cargo delivery game, this truck simulator offers you all American feature trucks that are full of power and excitement. Conquer the impossible tracks and be the best driver of all time. It is one of the best truck simulations of 2017.
Show the world that you have transport fever. This super truck racing game is totally for speed mutant who want to drive their 4x4 heavy trucks as a real extreme cargo truck driver in cargo truck driving mania of 4x4 heavy truck simulator games! Master up your skills to become a real driver of cargo truck in cargo truck driving mania of 4x4 heavy truck simulator games.
In this brand new cargo transporter truck game we have added fuel tank instead of time for completing the level. You have given the cargo truck with fuel tank and your job is to deliver the cargo in given amount of fuel. This is very interesting game you have to drive heavy vehicles in various multi levels, In Off-road and Busy City.
In this game you will have to play the role of the Truck Driver whos job is to deliver different kinds of cargo i.e transport building material on your construction truck and dump it on the construction site and many other scenarios.
Select your cargo truck from garage, customize it, upgrade your truck engine for increasing it speed and torque. So, Get ready for the Ultimate Truck Driving Game of all time which beats all other truck games, cargo games and car transporter games. In this newest truck transporter simulator you get to drive around in different vehicles such as a Heavy Oil Tanker Truck Trailer, a Big Heavy Cargo Truck also known as Grand Transporter Truck. You will use this to transport cargo trailer around the city and a big off-road uphill impossible tracks. Test your skills as the construction driver.
Sit behind the steering and control the heavy vehicles while performing your duty.
The challenging missions in cargo truck driving mania of 4x4 extreme truck mania games will keep you busy for many hours and it would not force you to fell boring. If you love construction games then u will also like this game. Show your skills as the extreme pro trucker to drive heavy duty transporter truck carrying cargo like drums and transport people as well. Beware of dangerous twists and turns, and the city traffic. You are a Trucker, deliver cargo safely. Extreme weather conditions with rainfalls and lighting could make your drive even more difficult. Drive mega transporter trucks and transport cargo to the destination.
Features:
• Stunning city 3D environment for this Truck simulator.
• Smooth and easy to use truck controls as truck driver.
• Multi level, mission based game.
• Realistic Truck physics.
• Multiple Camera views for our assistance in this construction simulator.
• Interesting game play, and challenging levels one after the other.
• Addictive and smooth gameplay.
• 6x6 wheeler trucks.
